Text: If you prefer a high-yield savings account, Vio Bank has an option that pays 2.52% on all balances , with a minimum of $100 required to open.
Cause: If you prefer a high-yield savings account
Effect: Vio Bank has an option that pays 2.52% on all balances , with a minimum of $100 required to open.
